value:
$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pWhere... Where am I?$k$pThe Rite of Flames... The Temple...$k$pOh, yes... I recall now... I died.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_05,0|$WmMPID_ヘル影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes. And so you come to me.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Who—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am death itself.$k$pNow that you have died...I will bring
you to my realm.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The realm of the dead? I see... I know
who you must be.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am Hel. I rule over the dead.$k$pThose who are unworthy of a greater
reward enter my dark realm.$k$pKing Surtr, Ruler of Flame...your
power is now mine.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Grr...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Resign yourself to your fate. You
cannot fight it. You cannot best
death.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hrmph. I suppose so. I was killed,
after all...$k$pYou rule over the dead. None in this
realm can hope to oppose you.$k$pBut if someone might...it would be
the summoner and the whelps that
killed me.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Let go of that fantasy, Ruler of
Flame...$k$pFor those who killed you will soon
be dead themselves.$k$pThat is my next task.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|And so I descend...into the realm of
the dead.$k$pSurtr has been killed. Your power
grows...and the nine worlds tremble.
Change is in the air...$k$pAnd as for the King of Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|She's here! The reports were
accurate—Loki is in the temple.
Prepare for battle!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|This is no time to let my emotions get
in the way, now is it?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Oh my. Defeated yet again... Well, I
must be on my way, my dears.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Wait just a minute! You always get
away. Not this time, Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah, Sharena, my dear...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|What?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I'll be seeing you again soon.$k$pAt least, I hope I will. Death's scythe
hangs over your head... I do hope we
can meet again before it strikes.$k$p$Sbs150|
